channel.title: Yo Man!
channel.description: A starter blog demonstrating what Gatsby can do.

item.title: PyEnv Simple Python version management
item.description: PyEnv is a simple python version management It reminds me of NVM for node and RVM for ruby. Install you can set a file when switching to a…
item.content:encoded:
PyEnv is a simple python version management

It reminds me of NVM for node and RVM for ruby.

Install

you can set a file when switching to a folder in order to activate the pre-selected environemnt

Works well with pip and (ana)conda

https://github.com/pyenv/pyenv

item.title: Machine Learning Model Categories
item.description: Supervised learning vs Unsupervised learning Supervised learning More accurate Labeled data required Requires human in the loop Unsupervised…
item.content:encoded:
Supervised learning vs Unsupervised learning

Supervised learning

  • More accurate
  • Labeled data required
  • Requires human in the loop

Unsupervised learning

  • Less accurate
  • No labelled data required
  • Minimal human effort

Clustering

Clustering represents a typical and well-known type of unsupervised learning. Clustering algorithms try to find natural groupings in data. Similar data points are considered in the same group. We call these groups clustes.

K means clustering

Elbow method for retrieving the K value

Euclidian distance

numpy is for matrix math
matplotlib is for graphing

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Phases, life is made of. There’s a part of us that wants things to never change. But things do change. A new phase in my life started…
item.content:encoded:
Phases, life is made of.

There’s a part of us that wants things to never change. But things do change. A new phase in my life started, unexpected and unwanted; but it happened and I’m embracing it. Change is good. Phases are good. Life’s a bitch.
